title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When the 'Finish' button is pressed, the JAR creation process fails and the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR file using the packager, the process fails and an error message is shown.
EB: The JAR packager should successfully create the JAR file without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the packager and select the desired options. 
2. Press the 'Finish' button to initiate the JAR creation process. 
3. Check if the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
